languages.text: {n}Взгляд губернатора темнеет, но под вашим пристальным взглядом он сдается.{/n} "Хорошо. Хорошо! Возможно, я недооценил бунт, считая его обычным вздором черни... Если тут и впрямь настоящая скверна, подпольный культ... это стоит расследовать. Я брошу на это дополнительные силы и отнесусь к вопросу серьезно. Обещаю, Ваша Светлость".

{n}The governor's eyes darken, but your unwavering gaze makes him give in.{/n} "All right. All right! Perhaps, I've underestimated the mutiny, writing it off as the rabble's usual nonsense... However, if it does involve corruption and an underground cult... this needs to be investigated. I'll assign additional resources to it and take the issue seriously. You have my word, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд губернатора темнеет, но под вашим пристальным взглядом он сдается.{/n} "Хорошо. Хорошо! Возможно, я недооценил бунт, считая его обычным вздором черни... Если тут и впрямь настоящая скверна, подпольный культ... это стоит расследовать. Я брошу на это дополнительные силы и отнесусь к вопросу серьезно. Обещаю, Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: {n}The governor's eyes darken, but your unwavering gaze makes him give in.{/n} "All right. All right! Perhaps I've been underestimating the mutiny, writing it off as the rabble's usual nonsense... If it does involve real corruption and an underground cult... this needs to be investigated. I'll put additional resources to it and take the issue seriously. I promise, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

I promise, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

I promise, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

You have my word, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

{n}The governor's eyes darken, but your unwavering gaze makes him give in.{/n} "All right. All right! Perhaps, I've underestimated the mutiny, writing it off as the rabble's usual nonsense... However, if it does involve corruption and an underground cult... this needs to be investigated. I'll assign additional resources to it and take the issue seriously. You have my word, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

languages.text: {n}Die Augen des Gouverneurs verdunkeln sich, doch dein fester Blick lässt ihn einknicken.{/n} "Also schön. Also schön! Vielleicht habe ich die Meuterei unterschätzt, sie als den üblichen Unfug des Pöbels abgetan ... Wenn aber Verderbtheit und ein geheimer Kult im Spiel sind ... müssen wir der Sache nachgehen. Ich weise zusätzliche Ressourcen zu und nehme die Sache ernst. Ihr habt mein Wort, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's eyes darken, but your unwavering gaze makes him give in.{/n} "All right. All right! Perhaps, I've underestimated the mutiny, writing it off as the rabble's usual nonsense... However, if it does involve corruption and an underground cult... this needs to be investigated. I'll assign additional resources to it and take the issue seriously. You have my word, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Augen des Gouverneurs verdunkeln sich, doch dein fester Blick lässt ihn einknicken.{/n} "Also schön. Also schön! Vielleicht habe ich die Meuterei unterschätzt, sie als den üblichen Unfug des Pöbels abgetan ... Wenn aber Verderbtheit und ein geheimer Kult im Spiel sind ... müssen wir der Sache nachgehen. Ich weise zusätzliche Ressourcen zu und nehme die Sache ernst. Ich verspreche es, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft."

languages.text: {n}Les yeux du gouverneur s'assombrissent, mais il cède devant votre regard inébranlable.{/n} « D'accord, d'accord ! J'ai peut-être sous-estimé la mutinerie, en n'y voyant que la bêtise habituelle de la populace... Cependant, si elle implique de la corruption et une secte secrète... il faut enquêter. Je vais affecter des ressources supplémentaires à cette tâche et prendre le problème au sérieux. Vous avez ma parole, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's eyes darken, but your unwavering gaze makes him give in.{/n} "All right. All right! Perhaps, I've underestimated the mutiny, writing it off as the rabble's usual nonsense... However, if it does involve corruption and an underground cult... this needs to be investigated. I'll assign additional resources to it and take the issue seriously. You have my word, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux du gouverneur s'assombrissent, mais il cède devant votre regard inébranlable.{/n} « D'accord, d'accord ! J'ai peut-être sous-estimé la mutinerie, en n'y voyant que la bêtise habituelle de la populace... Cependant, si elle implique de la corruption et une secte secrète... il faut enquêter. Je vais affecter des ressources supplémentaires à cette tâche et prendre le problème au sérieux. Vous avez ma parole, Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: {n}总督的目光变得阴沉起来，但你死死地盯着他。最终，他屈服了。{/n}“好吧，好吧！或许我确实低估了这场叛乱，把它当成了乌合之众惯例的聚众闹事……不过，如果真的牵扯到了腐化与地下邪教……那就要好好调查了。我会分配额外的资源，认真对待这个问题。我向您保证，大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's eyes darken, but your unwavering gaze makes him give in.{/n} "All right. All right! Perhaps, I've underestimated the mutiny, writing it off as the rabble's usual nonsense... However, if it does involve corruption and an underground cult... this needs to be investigated. I'll assign additional resources to it and take the issue seriously. You have my word, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}总督的目光变得阴沉起来，但你死死地盯着他。最终，他屈服了。{/n}“好吧，好吧！或许我确实低估了这场叛乱，把它当成了乌合之众惯例的聚众闹事……不过，如果真的牵扯到了腐化与地下邪教……那就要好好调查了。我会分配额外的资源，认真对待这个问题。我向您保证，大人。”

languages.text: {n}総督の目から光が失われたが、彼はこちらの揺るぎない視線に折れた。{/n}「あぁ、分かったよ！おそらく、この反乱を過小評価して、 庶民の戯れ言と聞き流していたのだろう…しかし、腐敗や陰で魔女団が絡んでいるというなら…調査する必要がある。もっと人員を割り当てて、この問題に真剣に取り組む。約束します、陛下」
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's eyes darken, but your unwavering gaze makes him give in.{/n} "All right. All right! Perhaps, I've underestimated the mutiny, writing it off as the rabble's usual nonsense... However, if it does involve corruption and an underground cult... this needs to be investigated. I'll assign additional resources to it and take the issue seriously. You have my word, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}総督の目から光が失われたが、彼はこちらの揺るぎない視線に折れた。{/n}「あぁ、分かったよ！おそらく、この反乱を過小評価して、 庶民の戯れ言と聞き流していたのだろう…しかし、腐敗や陰で魔女団が絡んでいるというなら…調査する必要がある。もっと人員を割り当てて、この問題に真剣に取り組む。約束しよう、陛下」

languages.text: {n}Los ojos del gobernador se oscurecen, pero tu mirada inquebrantable le hace ceder.{/n} «De acuerdo. ¡De acuerdo! Tal vez he subestimado la revuelta considerándola una tontería habitual de la plebe... Sin embargo, si se trata de corrupción y de una secta clandestina... hay que investigarlo. Asignaré recursos adicionales y me tomaré el asunto en serio. Le doy mi palabra, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's eyes darken, but your unwavering gaze makes him give in.{/n} "All right. All right! Perhaps, I've underestimated the mutiny, writing it off as the rabble's usual nonsense... However, if it does involve corruption and an underground cult... this needs to be investigated. I'll assign additional resources to it and take the issue seriously. You have my word, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos del gobernador se oscurecen, pero tu mirada inquebrantable le hace ceder.{/n}«De acuerdo. ¡De acuerdo! Tal vez he subestimado la revuelta considerándola una tontería habitual de la plebe... Sin embargo, si se trata de corrupción y de una secta clandestina... hay que investigarlo. Asignaré recursos adicionales y me tomaré el asunto en serio. Lo prometo, mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: {n}Valinin gözleri alevleniyor ancak kararlı bakışların, pes etmesine sebep oluyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ. Kabul! Belki de bu isyanı hafife almış, ayaktakımının her zamanki zırvalığı sanmışımdır... Lakin bu işe yozluk ve bir yeraltı tarikatı karışmışsa... Araştırılması lazım gelir. Bu işe ek kaynak tahsis edip meseleyi ciddiye alacağım. Size sözümdür {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor's eyes darken, but your unwavering gaze makes him give in.{/n} "All right. All right! Perhaps, I've underestimated the mutiny, writing it off as the rabble's usual nonsense... However, if it does involve corruption and an underground cult... this needs to be investigated. I'll assign additional resources to it and take the issue seriously. You have my word, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Valinin gözleri alevleniyor ancak kararlı bakışların, pes etmesine sebep oluyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ. Kabul! Belki de bu isyanı hafife almış, ayaktakımının her zamanki zırvalığı sanmışımdır... Lakin bu işe yozluk ve bir yeraltı tarikatı karışmışsa... Araştırılması lazım gelir. Bu işe ek kaynak tahsis edip meseleyi ciddiye alacağım. Size sözümdür {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
